about_the_game:
Supporter Pack

If you like minimalist tower defense and would like to further support us, you can purchase this support package, and we would greatly appreciate it!

Meanwhile, to thank you for your support, we will offer some gifts:
  • Copy Tower: It allows you to select two same Towers at the same time. You can find it in the bottom left corner of the stage selection scene after clear stage 2-8(campaign)
  • Mysterious level: After clear stage 5-8 (campaign), you can find him in the bottom left corner of the level selection interface

Please pay attention! This DLC will not bring you more campaign content, and the towers inside may not useful, but they are very funny!

Therefore, we will give it as a gift for the package, rather than making these funny towers available in the game itself
